record.title: RECESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate stands in recess until 2 p.m.
Thereupon, at 1 p.m., the Senate recessed until 2 p.m., and reassembled when called to order by the Acting President pro tempore.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The assistant legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
